title: Linux Commands
description: Learning simple and advanced Linux commands by examples.

courses.title: Part 1
courses.description: What is the shell. Commands and options. Navigating and exploring the system.

courses.title: Part 2
courses.description: Manipulating files and directories. Commands about comands. Command history and keyboard tricks.

courses.title: Part 3
courses.description: Exploring the system. Manipulating files and directories. Commands about commands.

courses.title: Part 4
courses.description: Redirecting input/output of the command to and from files. Connecting multiple commands together into powerful pipelines. Shell expansions and quotes. Command history.

courses.title: Part 7
courses.description: Searching for files (locate, find). Regular expressions (grep). Text processing (cat, sort, uniq, cut, paste, join, diff, tr, sed).
